name: Samurai Warrior: The Battles of Usagi Yojimbo
overview: Konnichi Wa! The Time: 17th Century. The Place: Feudal Japan. The Conflict: The land is rife with civil war as the great warlords of Japan battle with each other for control of the Shogunate, and control of Japan itself. The Hero: Usagi Yojimbo is the warrior who must oppose the dark forces, a lone Ronin Rabbit of great skill and endurance. Samurai Warrior is a game of combat, subtlety and manners!
